issue.title: [CF 544] TellMeWhen not loading after WoW patch
issue.body:
TellMeWhen v 6.0.1 is throwing an error on the new WoW patch version 5.
This is a fresh install of the add on, there are no saved variables.

Lua Error text:

Message: TellMeWhen: TellMeWhen_Options could not be loaded: Out of date
Time: 08/28/12 17:53:03
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2678: in function `LoadOptions'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1883: in function `Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2755: in function `?'
...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:146: in function <...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:146>
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4>
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?'
...When\Lib\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:91: in function `Fire'
...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:120: in function <...\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Lib\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119>

Locals: <none>


> Posted by CurseForge user macfergusson | Imported from CurseForge issue #544 | Raw

comments.body:
Using "Load out of Date Addons" function seems to fix for now, so it may just be a version flag somewhere?


> Posted by CurseForge user macfergusson

No response necessary, I see you have acknowledged this elsewhere.


> Posted by CurseForge user macfergusson
